member.name: DML_FEATURE
member.summary: Defines a set of optional features and capabilities that can be queried from the DirectML device. See .

member.name: DML_FEATURE.DML_FEATURE_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Allows querying for tensor data type support. The query type is , and the support data type is .

member.name: DML_FEATURE.DML_FEATURE_FEATURE_LEVELS
member.summary: Allows querying for the feature levels supported by the device. The query type is , and the support data type is .
